meanings.definition: Located or situated beneath the nose.
meanings.sent1: The subnasal area of the face is just below the nose.
meanings.sent2: Her glasses rested on her subnasal region comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The subnasal tickle from the feather made him giggle.
meanings.sent4: The subnasal warmth of the scarf felt like a cozy hug.
meanings.sent5: The subnasal smell of the flowers was delightful.

meanings.definition: A structure or feature positioned below the nose.
meanings.sent1: The doctor pointed to the subnasal on the medical diagram.
meanings.sent2: The subnasal of the statue was finely sculpted.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally bumped her subnasal against the door.
meanings.sent4: The subnasal of the car resembled a sleek design.
meanings.sent5: The subnasal twitch gave away his amusement.
